LanguageData.Joywire.label: joywire
LanguageData.Joywire.description: This little brain implant will make you feel happy and relaxed, though you might end up a bit drowsy as a result.
LanguageData.Painstopper.label: painstopper
LanguageData.Painstopper.description: This brain implant will make you not feel pain.
